alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 18 at 2:11PM PST until February 20 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 17 inches. Heaviest accumulations will occur Saturday evening. * WHERE...Holden Village, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous by Saturday evening. Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
